code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Game=()=>{const[startWord,setStartWord]=useState('');const[endWord,setEndWord]=useState('');const[algoChoice,setAlgoChoice]=useState(1);const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const handleFindPath=()=>{axios.post('http://localhost:8080/api/word-azul/find-path',{startWord,endWord,algoChoice}).then(response=>{setResult(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error:',error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Start Word",value:startWord,onChange:e=>setStartWord(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"End Word",value:endWord,onChange:e=>setEndWord(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:algoChoice,onChange:e=>setAlgoChoice(Number(e.target.value)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:1,children:"UCS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:2,children:"Greedy Best-First Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:3,children:"A*"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleFindPath,children:"Search"}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Path: ",result.path.join(' -> ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Nodes Visited: ",result.nodesVisited]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Execution Time: ",result.executionTime," ms"]})]})]});};export default Game;
